text: Moehringia villosa, commonly known as the short-haired sandwort, is a flowering plant of the genus Moehringia. It is endemic to Slovenia where it has a very limited range with an extent of occurrence of less than in the southern parts of the Julian Alps. It grows in cracks in sunny, rocky and dry areas. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Flora of Slovenia villosa
title: Moehringia villosa
